metadata.title: CVE-2024-57662 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue in the sqlg_hash_source component of openlink virtuoso-opensourcev7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted SQLstatements.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-57662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirtodbc0 - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-minimal - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-opensource - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-opensource-7 - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-opensource-7-bin - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-opensource-7-common - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-server - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-bpel - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-conductor - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-demo - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-isparql - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-ods - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-rdfmappers - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-sparqldemo - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-syncml - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vad-tutorial - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
virtuoso-vsp-startpage - 7.2.12+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.2.12+dfsg-1').
